howItWorks.title: What is an "Empty Leg"?
howItWorks.description1: An empty leg flight, also called a "positioning flight", is a private aircraft flying empty after dropping off passengers, or on its way to pick up passengers.
howItWorks.description2: Since the aircraft has to make this flight anyway, charter companies offer these "empty" seats at a significant discount - often up to 75% off the normal price.
howItWorks.description3: Jetleg centralizes the supply from hundreds of reliable operators, so you can easily find and book the perfect deal. It's the smartest way to experience the luxury of private flying.

questions: How do I book an empty leg flight?
answers: Booking an empty leg flight is simple through our platform. Search for available flights, select your desired option and complete the payment online.
Our cancellation conditions vary by operator, but usually offer flexibility up to 24-48 hours before departure. Always check the specific conditions in your booking.
You need a valid passport or identity card, depending on your destination. For international flights a visa may be required.
Changes are possible depending on availability and the operator's conditions. Contact our customer service for assistance.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about empty leg flights and our platform.

general.title: General
questions: What is an empty leg flight?
answers: Jetleg is a platform specialized in empty leg flights - private jet flights that would otherwise fly empty. We offer these flights at heavily reduced prices, making private jet travel more accessible.

An empty leg flight occurs when a private jet has to return to its base without passengers, or has to move to a new location for the next client. Instead of flying empty, operators offer these flights at reduced prices.
Empty leg flights can be up to 75% cheaper than regular private jet charters. The exact savings depend on the route, aircraft type and timing of the flight.
Absolutely. All flights are operated by certified operators who meet the highest safety standards. Our partners have all necessary licenses and certifications for commercial flights.

booking.title: Booking and Payment
questions: How do I book a flight?
Which payment methods do you accept?
What happens after I book an empty leg?
Are flights to other continents also available?
answers: Booking is simple: search for a flight on our website, select your desired option, fill in your details and pay securely online. You will receive immediate confirmation by email.
We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), iDEAL, bank transfer and other local payment methods depending on your location.
Cancellation conditions vary per flight and operator. In general, empty legs are less flexible than regular charters. Always check the specific conditions when booking.
Yes, after payment you automatically receive an invoice by email. For business bookings we can provide customized invoices with your company details.

After booking you'll receive an immediate confirmation email with all flight details and your e-tickets. Our customer service will contact you if needed for any special requirements. On the day of departure, go directly to the private terminal - arrive 15-30 minutes before departure. After landing, you'll receive a questionnaire to share your experience with us.

Currently we focus primarily on Europe, North America and the UAE. Flights to Asia, South America, Africa and Australia are in development and will be available in the near future. We are actively expanding our partnerships worldwide to soon offer you these beautiful destinations as well.

flights.title: Flight Details
questions: How far in advance are empty legs available?
Can I change the departure time?
answers: Empty legs are often available last-minute, from a few hours to a maximum of 2 weeks in advance. Most deals are published 24-72 hours in advance.
Limited flexibility is possible, but changes depend on the operator and flight schedule. Small adjustments (1-2 hours) are sometimes possible for an additional fee.
In bad weather we follow standard aviation protocols. Flights may be delayed or cancelled for your safety. In that case you get a full refund or alternative options.
Standard catering is usually included. Special dietary requirements or premium catering may incur additional costs. This is clearly indicated when booking.

practical.title: Practical matters
questions: How much baggage can I take?
Do I have to check in earlier?
answers: Baggage limits vary by aircraft type. Generally 20-30kg hand luggage and 20-50kg hold luggage is allowed. You can see exact limits in the flight details.
Check-in is much faster for private jets. Arrive 15-30 minutes before departure at the terminal. At smaller airports this can be even shorter.
Pets are often allowed on private jets, depending on the operator and destination. Ask about specific rules and any additional costs when booking.
You need a valid passport for international flights and an identity card for domestic flights. Check visa requirements for your destination.

hero.title: About Jetleg
hero.subtitle: We revolutionize private jet travel by making empty leg flights accessible and affordable for everyone.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.paragraph1: Jetleg was founded with a simple but powerful mission: to democratize luxury travel. We believe everyone should be able to enjoy the benefits of private jet travel, without the traditional high costs.
mission.paragraph2: By utilizing empty leg flights - flights that would otherwise fly empty - we offer our customers the opportunity to travel in style at a fraction of the normal price.
mission.paragraph3: Our technology connects travelers directly with available flights, creating both economic and ecological benefits.

safety.title: Safety first
safety.description: We only work with certified operators who meet the highest safety standards.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Every flight is handled with the greatest attention to detail and service.

customerCentric.title: Customer-focused
customerCentric.description: Our customers are central to everything we do, from booking to after-care.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make luxury travel accessible by optimally utilizing unused capacity.

xavier.name: Xavier Verhoestraete
xavier.description: With 15 years of experience in aviation, Xavier led the revolution in private jet travel.

carley.name: Carley Hamaway
carley.description: Carley develops the technology that makes our platform so user-friendly.

marc.name: Marc Dubois
marc.description: Marc ensures that every flight runs perfectly, from booking to landing.

whatIsEmptyLeg.question: What is an empty leg flight?
whatIsEmptyLeg.answer: An empty leg flight is a private flight where the aircraft flies empty back to its base or to the next destination. These flights are offered at reduced rates because they would otherwise fly empty.

howToBook.question: How do I book a flight?
howToBook.answer: Use our search function to find available flights. Select your desired flight and follow the booking steps. You will receive a confirmation email once your booking is complete.

afterBooking.question: What happens after I book an empty leg?
afterBooking.answer: After your booking, you will immediately receive a confirmation email with all flight details and your e-tickets. Our customer service will contact you if necessary for any special requirements. On the day of departure, you can go directly to the private terminal - check in 15-30 minutes before departure. After landing, you will receive a questionnaire to share your experience with us.

otherDestinations.question: Are flights to other continents also available?
otherDestinations.answer: Currently, we mainly focus on Europe, North America, and the UAE. Flights to Asia, South America, Africa, and Australia are in development and will be available in the near future. We are actively expanding our partnerships worldwide to offer you these beautiful destinations soon.

cancellationPolicy.question: What is the cancellation policy?
cancellationPolicy.answer: Cancellations are possible up to 24 hours before departure. Cancellation within 24 hours may incur charges. Please check the specific terms of your booking.

luggagePolicy.question: How much luggage can I take?
luggagePolicy.answer: Baggage rules vary by aircraft type. Generally, hand luggage is always included. For checked baggage, we advise contacting us for exact limits.

paymentMethods.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and bank transfers. Payment is processed through a secure connection.

flightChanges.question: Can I change my flight?
flightChanges.answer: Changes are possible depending on availability and may incur additional costs. Please contact us for changes.
